game.title: The Dragon's Redemption
game.objective: Conquer the Dragon's lair and bring peace
game.description: A mighty dragon looms ahead, seeking to subjugate our land. Your mission is to defeat it and restore harmony. Beware, its strength is unmatched!

task.objective: Acquire dragon's map from the library
task.description: First, locate the rare dragon's map in the royal library to navigate safely through its territory.

task.objective: Fight off the dragon's guards by the entrance
task.description: Clear the path with courage and defeat the guards near the lair entrance.

task.objective: Confront the dragon in its lair
task.description: The ultimate challenge awaits: face the dragon inside its lair and bring about victory.
